content.raw:
This likely breaks markers. I'm checking now. 

The change was put into markers because previously `Scene::SimTime()` only updated when a model was created, deleted, or moved. So, and empty world would always be zero, even if physics was running. 

You can test by giving a marker a lifetime.

We may need two different variables for "time" in the scene class.
content.html:
This likely breaks markers. I'm checking now.

The change was put into markers because previously Scene::SimTime() only updated when a model was created, deleted, or moved. So, and empty world would always be zero, even if physics was running.

You can test by giving a marker a lifetime.

We may need two different variables for "time" in the scene class.
